query.statement:
SELECT B.BEDAT , K.NAME1 , J.POSID , M.ZSITE_NM , L.ZSPEC1 , L.ZSPEC2 , C.MATNR , C.TXZ01 , C.MENGE , C.MEINS , L.ZZDAT01 , L.ZZCOMP2 , VALUE((SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(PRO_R) > 100 THEN 100 ELSE SUM(PRO_R) END AS PRO_R FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0112 B WHERE B.MANDT = L.MANDT AND B.PSPID = L.POSID AND B.POSID = L.POSID_1 ),0) AS PRO_R , L.ZQEGEMSA , L.ZBEPJEO , L.NAMET , VALUE((SELECT CELLP FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0011 AS P WHERE P.MANDT = L.MANDT AND P.TEMNO = L.TEMNO AND P.RETIF = '' AND P.ZZACTSS = L.ZZACTSS FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY WITH UR ),'') AS CELLPT , M12.NAME1 AS NAME2 , L.NAMET2 , VALUE((SELECT CELLP FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 AS P WHERE P.MANDT = L.MANDT AND P.NAMEE = L.NAMET2 AND P.RETIF = '' AND P.GBN = 'A' AND P.LIFNR = L.LIFNR FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY WITH UR ),'') AS CELLPT2 , M.TEXT30 , M.ADDR1 , M.ADDR2 FROM SAPHEE.EKKO AS B INNER JOIN SAPHEE.EKPO AS C ON C.MANDT = B.MANDT AND C.EBELN = B.EBELN INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS D ON D.MANDT = C.MANDT AND D.MATNR = C.MATNR INNER JOIN SAPHEE.EKKN AS I ON I.MANDT = C.MANDT AND I.EBELN = C.EBELN AND I.EBELP = C.EBELP INNER JOIN SAPHEE.PRPS AS J ON J.MANDT = I.MANDT AND J.PSPNR = I.PS_PSP_PNR INNER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS K ON K.MANDT = J.MANDT AND K.LIFNR = B.LIFNR INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS L ON L.MANDT = J.MANDT AND L.POSID_1 = LEFT(J.POSID,9) INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS M ON M.MANDT = J.MANDT AND M.POSID = LEFT(J.POSID,6) LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M12 ON L.MANDT = M12.MANDT AND L.LIFNR = M12.LIFNR WHERE B.MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND L.ZZCOMP2 BETWEEN #FROM_DT# AND #TO_DT# AND D.MATNR_NM = 'JAMB'
AND J.POSID LIKE '%' || #POSID# || '%'
AND C.MATNR = #MATNR#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
